name: The Game: Unstable Version
description:
You are a video game tester.

Your task is to play a top-down shooter game in unstable version and discover all the glitches in this game.

Controls:

Press WASD or Arrow keys to move.

Press Left Mouse to fire.

Press R to reload.

Press Right Mouse to dodge or something.

Music: Dead Lock    by Elwood

https://modarchive.org/index.php?request=view_by_moduleid&query=35280
